title: 16-year-old killed in double shooting in Buffalo identified
content:
A 16-year-old, Kristian Piazza of Buffalo, has died after a double shooting Thursday night in Buffalo, according to a Buffalo police spokesman.
The shooting happened near the intersection of Leroy Avenue and Hill Street at about 7:55 p.m. Thursday, according to Buffalo police.
Piazza died at Erie County Medical Center, police said.
The other shooting victim, Terrell Lockett, a 16-year-old male from Cheektowaga, was treated and released from ECMC, according to Michael J. DeGeorge. a Buffalo police department spokesman.
Anyone with information about the incident is asked to call or text the Police tip line at 716-847-2255.
Related: Map: Gun activity in Buffalo in 2016
